meanings.definition: (adjective) Superlative form of kludgy; most awkwardly or inelegantly made or done.
meanings.sent1: The kludgiest chair in the room wobbled unsteadily.
meanings.sent2: She tried to fix the kludgiest part of the broken toy.
meanings.sent3: The kludgiest cake at the bake sale looked like a lopsided tower.
meanings.sent4: His attempt at DIY furniture was the kludgiest creation in the house.
meanings.sent5: The kludgiest drawing in the art class resembled a messy scribble.

meanings.definition: (adverb) In a manner that is the most awkwardly or inelegantly made or done.
meanings.sent1: He moved kludgiest when trying to balance on the narrow beam.
meanings.sent2: The machine operated kludgiest when the power fluctuated.
meanings.sent3: She danced kludgiest at the party, tripping over her own feet.
meanings.sent4: The car engine sputtered kludgiest when it was low on fuel.
meanings.sent5: The robot moved kludgiest when its circuits were malfunctioning.
